name: @klippa/nativescript-login
description: The best way to do social logins in NativeScript, a plugin with modern SDKs to allow authentication to various providers with access to all SDK features

scripts.build: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run ngcc && npm run ngc
scripts.build.old: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run ngcc && npm run ngc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @klippa/nativescript-login && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @klippa/nativescript-login && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
